mapper.select: SELECT P.ISOLEA, P.ISOLEB, P.POUTCOME, P.PNUM, M.EMNUM, M.NAME, M.DNAME, M.POSITION FROM PCRTBL P, MEMBERTBL M WHERE P.EMNUM = M.EMNUM AND P.ISOLEB > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')
SELECT P.ISOLEA, P.ISOLEB, P.POUTCOME, M.EMNUM, M.NAME, M.DNAME, M.POSITION FROM PCRTBL P, MEMBERTBL M WHERE P.EMNUM = M.EMNUM AND ROWNUM <=10 ORDER BY ISOLEA DESC
SELECT * FROM PCRTBL WHERE PNUM =#{pnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM PCRTBL WHERE EMNUM =#{emnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY PNUM
